Title: The Lying Detective
Writer: Steven Moffat, Steven Moffat (created by), Mark Gatiss (created by), Arthur Conan Doyle (based on the works of)
Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs, Rupert Graves
Plot: Sherlock goes up against the powerful and seemingly unassailable Culverton Smith - a man with a very dark secret indeed.
